TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MobileDeviceCapabilitiesSectionHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class has been deprecated. Please use the System.Web.Mobile.DeviceFiltersSection class instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 请阅读配置文件的 [deviceFilters 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fb323b9-675b-48de-861b-8998fa0c51ba)一节，该配置文件指定了用于 ASP.NET 移动控件的一组设备筛选器。

span.span: Reads the [deviceFilters Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2fb323b9-675b-48de-861b-8998fa0c51ba) section of a configuration file that specifies the set of device filters for use with ASP.NET mobile controls.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

para.span: 继承 类的类的实例必须是线程安全的，并且是无状态的。

span.span: Instances of classes that inherit the class must be thread safe and stateless.

para.span: 方法必须可同时从多个线程调用。

span.span: The method must be callable from multiple threads simultaneously.

para.span: 有关继承的详细信息，请参阅 。

span.span: See for more information about inheriting.
